definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very

sentences.english: Finland invested in communications and IT at exactly the right time.
sentences.chinese: 芬兰在通讯和信息技术方面的投资可谓恰逢其时。

sentences.english: " Where "exactly" the word can be described as exquisite peerless.
sentences.chinese: 这里的“恰好”二字可谓精妙绝伦。

sentences.english: And Marchisio similar can be said of today's armed forces Yongming Juventus.
sentences.chinese: 与马尔基西奥类似，今天的尤文图斯可谓三军用命。

sentences.english: Everything from prothetic limbs to pre-fabricated houses will be made using similar printing technology.
sentences.chinese: 从医用假肢到预制房屋，3D打印技术可谓无处不在。

sentences.english: B: They have racked their brain.
Ford (F, Fortune 500) is the 800-pound gorilla of the taxi business.
sentences.chinese: 福特可谓出租车行业的巨无霸。

sentences.english: Because previous round the yellow card stops play, the Li Yi epicycle lifts a ban resurfaces .
sentences.chinese: 上轮因黄牌停赛，李毅本轮可谓解禁复出。

sentences.english: There is no clear cut moment where you can say that the new world has arrived.
sentences.chinese: 没有一个确切的时刻可谓新世界到临了。

sentences.english: The temperature-changing character of northeast is "warm winter and cool summer".
sentences.chinese: 东北地区的气温变化特点，可谓是“冬暖夏凉”。

sentences.english: Of course, many developing countries are envious of China's rise.
sentences.chinese: 当然，有很多发展中国家对天朝之崛起可谓分外眼红。

sentences.english: The Cruze has been wildly successful.
Rationalistic tradition had been from Ancient Greek in western philosophy.
sentences.chinese: 理性主义传统在西方可谓源远流长。

sentences.english: Throughout Shu-shan Wen-hai, with regard to the interpretation of love can be described are mixed.
sentences.chinese: 纵观书山文海，关于爱情的诠释可谓是众说纷纭。

sentences.english: His term as president was tumultuous.
sentences.chinese: 他在职总统期间可谓波澜起伏。

sentences.english: And according to manager Wenger, Bendtner has improved dramatically over the last month.
sentences.chinese: 而对温格而言，本特纳在上个月可谓发生了质变。

sentences.english: BRITAIN'S pensioners are a cosseted lot.
sentences.chinese: 英国的退休老人可谓是集万千宠爱于一身。

definition: can be rated as/can be said to be
indeed/truly/(coll.) (used to express disapproval, annoyance etc about sth)
see 眾所周知|众所周知[zhong4 suo3 zhou1 zhi1]
from this, it can be seen that...
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
it goes to show that/one can see
not only (this one)/not just (...) but also
